events.title: Recruitment Drive
events.desc: Interested in getting involved in an organization this semester? Check out ACM's Recruitment Drive! Learn about our seven communities focusing on a variety of computer science topics while building your resume.
events.shortDesc: Interested in getting involved in an organization this semester?

events.title: Ice Cream Social
events.desc: ACM-W is starting off the semester with a meet and greet featuring a free ice cream bar! Join us not only to meet new people, but also to learn about ACM-W, upcoming events, and how to get involved. ACM-W welcomes all students (male or female) that wish to promote women in computing from any major including Computer Science, Business and Information Technology, and Mathematics.
events.shortDesc: ACM-W is starting off the semester with a meet and greet featuring a free ice cream bar!

events.title: Career Fair Dinner
events.desc: Talk to companies looking for Computer Science students for longer than a 2-minute career fair interaction, without the hassle of waiting in long lines. Join ACM at our fall Career Fair Dinner! Reminder: You must be an ACM member to participate in the dinner.
events.shortDesc: Talk to companies looking for Computer Science students for longer than a 2-minute career fair interaction, without the hassle of waiting in long lines.

events.title: Programming Cup
events.desc: Come out and see who is the best programmer on campus! A number of programming languages are accepted including: C++, Java, Python 2 & 3, C, C#, Go, Javascript, Objective-C, PHP, Prolog, Ruby, and Scala.
events.shortDesc: Come out and see who is the best programmer on campus!

events.title: WiFi Workshop
events.desc: A practical workshop on common WiFi vulnerabilities.
events.shortDesc: A practical workshop on common WiFi vulnerabilities.

events.title: Lockpicking Fundraiser
events.desc: Learn how to lockpick and compete to win a lockpicking set. Proceeds support ACM Security.
events.shortDesc: Learn how to lockpick and compete to win a lockpicking set. Proceeds support ACM Security.

events.title: MinerLAN
events.desc: Relax, eat food, and play games to win prizes with ACM before starting finals!
events.shortDesc: Relax, eat food, and play games to win prizes with ACM before starting finals!
